sumarize_req: Dream Social Network (DSN) is an online community platform where users can freely express their thoughts, feelings, dreams, moods, and individual opinions within a personal space. It aims to facilitate global idea sharing, enabling members to post ideas, seek feedback, and potentially conduct informal surveys. DSN is also a space for sharing dreams, connecting users who have similar dream experiences or aspirations, and fostering potential deep connections. The platform serves as a tool to help users articulate their ideas and dreams, leveraging community interaction to find support and work towards making their aspirations a reality.
